issues.description: The template repository declares the symbol fix_vec_sub_asm as global (exported), while the solution repository marks it extern (imported). This visibility mismatch will confuse students and likely break the linking process, since the definition and export conventions differ.
issues.suggested_fix: Replace the ‘extern fix_vec_sub_asm’ directive in the solution file with ‘global fix_vec_sub_asm’ so that both template and solution consistently export the symbol.
